input: Send a batch request to retrieve borrower change requests for loan contract UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests?$filter=LoanContractUUID eq '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
